summary.para: The step takes the document appearing on its source port and replaces matching nodes with the document appearing on the replacement port.

description.para: The step takes the XSLT match pattern in the match option and holds this against the document appearing on its source port. Any matching nodes are replaced by the document on the replacement port. The resulting document is emitted on the result port.

detail.para: For obvious reasons, you cannot replace attributes and namespace nodes.
Replacing by is not recursive. In other words: there are no replacements in a replacement.
There is one exception: if the resulting document contains only text, the content-type document-property is changed to text/plain.
